Title: Reimbursement for certain lunch meals served during the declared COVID-19 state of emergency
Summary: Relates to reimbursement for certain lunch meals served during the declared COVID-19 state of emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 537 of the laws of 1976, relating to paid, free and reduced price breakfast for eligible pupils in certain school districts, in relation to reimbursement for certain lunch meals served during the declared COVID-19 state of emergency
